title: Labyrinth of Truth
description:
Labyrinth of Truth - A video series of Mystery Babylon 



This is the truth in rare form. This video series has been met with serious opposition on every single video upload site I've visited through search engines since I first grabbed these videos from(they were uploaded within a couple hours from me getting them mind you). I've since went back to that user only to find out he's been banned, and the videos removed. I searched for others... banned/removed everywhere I look.


Recently, they've been uploaded under new user names, but they constantly get taken down.


So here they are folks!!! UNCENSORED, and here to stay!!! INFOWARSTV is the TRUTH people!!! This series is a MUST watch for anyone interested in the Illuminati, Mystery Babylon (its origin ultimately) and its plans for YOU and YOUR FAMILY in the current state of world affairs!!!


I've compiled these clips and created a professionally edited DVD for your viewing pleasure.  The menu allows you to pick whichever track you'd like to begin with and will automatically skip to the next video.


Enjoy....
